data.name: Startup Survival Checklist
data.summary:
Like most startups, Printo is steering through a “perfect storm”.

In this prescriptive session, seasoned entrepreneur and co-founder of Printo - Manish Sharma will lay out a survival checklist for startups, drawing from his own experience.

Get actionable advice directly from a practitioner on how to manage your cash flow, tweak your financial model and design your actions to enable your startup’s survival through these tough times
